title: Clinical Competency Enhancement: Sustainability of Blended Learning-Based Elementary Social Studies e-Learning Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze evaluation systems of existing e-learning resources and revise over 20% of formative assessment items to align with instructional objectives
Learners can redesign three or more educational resources using digital content creation tools (e.g., H5P, Google Sites) required for social studies projects
Learners can derive and implement at least two e-learning improvement strategies through weekly collaborative meetings with peer teachers and instructors
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
